title: 格雷5.08.32能不能用在服务器上联机？
author: ice_shiki
txt_content:
格雷5.08.32能不能用在服务器上联机的，装了格雷客户端就登不上去了，每次一登陆不是客户端闪退就是显示连接超时，服务器已经正常启动了，服务端内存最大4G最小1Gforge1451，客户端内存最大2G最小1G客户端forge1448


之前用5.07.07在forge1291的版本下都可以正常的玩，但是rc跟bc6之间有问题引擎不能通用




log文件贴在下面
[19:01:53] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2350ms behind, skipping 47 tick(s)
[19:02:38] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2611ms behind, skipping 52 tick(s)
[19:02:54] [Server thread/INFO]: shiki[/127.0.0.1:28907] logged in with entity id 2238 at (36.5, 69.0, 271.5)
[19:02:54] [Server thread/INFO]: shiki joined the game
[19:02:57] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2521ms behind, skipping 50 tick(s)
[19:03:07] [Server thread/INFO]: shiki has just earned the achievement [Taking Inventory]
[19:03:14] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2824ms behind, skipping 56 tick(s)
[19:03:54] [Server thread/INFO]: shiki lost connection: TranslatableComponent{key='disconnect.genericReason', args=[Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: 远程主机强迫关闭了一个现有的连接。], siblings=[], style=Style{hasParent=false, color=null, bold=null, italic=null, underlined=null, obfuscated=null, clickEvent=null, hoverEvent=null}}
[19:03:54] [Server thread/INFO]: shiki left the game

replies.author: 鸭蛋只吃黄
replies.txt_content: 当然可以，注意适用版本就行

replies.author: ice_shiki
replies.txt_content:
凋灵兔子 发表于 2015-12-14 20:00
当然可以，注意适用版本就行
然而我一装上格雷就无法登陆服务器，不是会连接超时就是闪退怎么办，服务器forge是1451的应是可以用的，应该不是mod冲突因为服务器可以正常启动
姑且附上mod列表




QQ截图20151214215627.png (18.83 KB, 下载次数: 7)

下载附件

2015-12-14 21:57 上传

replies.author: gonglinyuan
replies.txt_content:
这是格雷5发布帖上的一句话：
Forge 1428-1481 breaks GT Multiplayer!!!
也就是说forge1428~1481不能用格雷联机
可以用1428之前的版本(推荐1291)或者1481之后的版本(推荐1492或者1517)
